sentence: That's while the clash between the entertainment conglomerate and Florida's Governor Ron DeSantis has cost the Mouse House the special tax status it's held for over a half-century.
author: Carly Mayberry
title: Disney's LGBTQ-Friendly Content Prompts New Challenge from GOP Senators

author: Alexander Bolton
title: GOP senators call on TV ratings board to help parents shield kids from LGBTQ characters
